short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add quick notes to web pages with Quickmindr to remind why you opened them or where you left off.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Too many open tabs?

And you can't avoid having that many open because you have multiple projects going on and stuff that you need searching or referencing all the time? 

Check.

That gets difficult to manage pretty quickly - then you need notes; paper scribbles, post-its and anything in between... but they get lost, or not carried with you everywhere you go.

This is overwhelming. You are likely to go over a lot of webpages and even if you don't want to you're keeping track of them in your head. Or you still need something from those pages.
 
So you feel overwhelmed.

Introducing Quickmindr! 🚀 The ultimate tool for web browsing efficiency! 💻🌐

🧠 Say goodbye to mental clutter! Quickmindr tracks your web activity, so you don't have to.
🌍 Accessible anywhere! Log into your Google account on Chrome and bring Quickmindr with you. 🚶‍♀️
📌 Extract key information in seconds! Highlight & save important text for future review. 📚
⚡ Boost productivity & time management! Get more done with Quickmindr by your side. 📈
🛡️ Privacy-focused! Your data stays secure and private. 🔒
Try Quickmindr now and revolutionize your browsing experience! 🎉🌟 #Quickmindr #Productivity #EfficientBrowsing

This is how it works:
1. Once you have installed Quickmindr, in any webpage click CTRL+SHIFT+1 for Quickmindr to appear. 
2. Write your mindr and save.
3. Click CTRL+SHIFT+1 to hide and continue with your work.
4. You come back to the webpage at another time, the Quickmindr app opens and shows your mindr (your notes).

The best part?? once you have set a mindr in the page, anytime you visit that webpage your note will show automatically. This is true for this week, next week, next year or many years from now. As long as you don't delete the Quickmindr extension all your data will be right there where you need it.

You can try totally free. You get 30 mindrs a month for free and you can buy a license for unlimited mindrs for a yearly purchase fee.

Try it today and 💋kiss goodbye to that 🧠 overwhelming sensation. Welcome to a new age of productivity⚡.
